list_of_reviews.review_title: I made mistake by depositing BEP20…
list_of_reviews.review: I made mistake by depositing BEP20 token to ERC20 adress at my Lbank account. So I had problem. Customer support responded, warned me that it will take about 30 days to solve this problem. They took a fee. After 32 days problem was solved, my ETH was refunded(few grand $worth). So in my personal experience they are legit and ok. Then I bought btc instead of altcoin I previously wanted to buy, and succesfuly withdrawn it. So I will use this exchange in future.

Otherwise they will keep losing customer due to inconvenience and rude people they hire.

Ive been VERY satisfied with all the Lbank features i have used and i just wanted to give them some postive credit amogst all the negative. At one point i have had upwards of 100,000 dollars of my money in Lbank and again, no isuues at all.

Not good.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Low performance platform for trading
list_of_reviews.review: Lbank platform is very hard to use compare to Binance, Crypto.com...and also when needed of tax report has to contact customer service that requires ridiculous things to take a selfie with the date and the photo ID. Much more with the person I chatted to named Kobe. The unprofessional and rude. Lbank needs alot of change band update to compete with other platform if they want to stand out. Otherwise they will keep losing customer due to inconvenience and rude people they hire.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I made mistake by depositing BEP20…
list_of_reviews.review: I made mistake by depositing BEP20 token to ERC20 adress at my Lbank account. So I had problem. Customer support responded, warned me that it will take about 30 days to solve this problem. They took a fee. After 32 days problem was solved, my ETH was refunded(few grand $worth). So in my personal experience they are legit and ok. Then I bought btc instead of altcoin I previously wanted to buy, and succesfuly withdrawn it. So I will use this exchange in future.

list_of_reviews.review_title: From =India
list_of_reviews.review: From =India We are a Lbank customer and we are from India We did TRX withdrawal from Lbank on 28-11-22 after 2 minutes my account got closed then we contacted Lbank official he said.HCD Sir 👇1)Since you have triggered the risk control limit, you need to investigate your account, thank you.2) Your account triggers the risk control system, and the account is temporarily inoperable. Account not yet opened and withdrawal not received.it's been 8 days.  passed, no problem resolved. HCD sir is speaking please Wait. It is my mistake that we high withdrawn TRX more than that's why my account is not opening.🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻

list_of_reviews.review_title: Ghosting and not serious.

Not good.

list_of_reviews.review_title: LBank is a good exchange and I'm using it
list_of_reviews.review: I started using LBank mid 2021 and I can tell it's one of the best exchanges out there. They don't execute orders in hidden and no hidden charges .Another good thing about LBank is ther good customer support especially on telegram, they'll give you full support immediately you message their admins.I'll really recommend LBank fully to everyone out there

list_of_reviews.review_title: Lbank is reliable and can be trusted
list_of_reviews.review: Lbank is reliable and can be trusted.The customer support cannot be faulted.Everytime I have had an issue or problem, customer support has always stayed on the line with me until resolved.When investing DYOR, on every coin as some coins have tokenomics.When sending/receiving currency double check address and network and fees, ensure minimum amount is met.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for www.lbank.info. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Key phrases indicating concerns: "customer service is a ghost town," "ghosting and not serious," "stopped responding." Praise: "LBank is a good exchange," "very secure and easy to use." These suggest issues with customer service responsiveness and reliability, alongside positive views on security and general usability.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 3, indicating mixed satisfaction. The distribution is polarized with equal positive and negative reviews, reflecting varied user experiences with the app's features and support.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: User experiences with the app are mixed, averaging a 3 out of 5 rating. Positive reviews commend its security and usability, while negative feedback points to slow customer support and account management issues. Concerns about credibility and efficiency are evident.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews highlight security and usability, while negative reviews focus on slow customer support and account management issues. Key differentiators are effective support and platform reliability.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the www.lbank.info support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Customer support at LBank receives mixed feedback. Some users praise the immediate support on Telegram, while others report a need for better training and instances of unexplained account locks and empty promises, indicating inconsistency in effectiveness and responsiveness.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews of the app reveal a polarized user experience, with an average rating of 3 out of 5, indicating a balance of satisfaction and dissatisfaction among users. Key themes from positive reviews include commendations for the app's security features and its ease of use, suggesting that the app is generally user-friendly and reliable in terms of protecting user data. However, critical issues highlighted in negative reviews focus on customer support, with users feeling that the support team requires more training and that there is a lack of clear communication, particularly when accounts are locked without explanation. Additionally, there are mentions of "empty promises from support," pointing to a disconnect between user expectations and the support received. For potential improvement, the app's developers should investigate the customer support process, enhance training for support staff, and establish more transparent communication channels to address account management concerns and improve overall user satisfaction.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Warning
list_of_reviews.review: I can only warn everybody from this bank. Money from 2 trades disappeared, although the chat support had confirmed, that it's still there. But they didn't reply my question, how to transfer it my wallet.Two email to their support without response. That's how L-bank earns money!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Scam company and thieves
list_of_reviews.review: I put a stop limit, price never hit on any other exchange. L bank forced long position to close and stole my money. I contacted support and they never got back to me. I have receipts of my position. Even on KuCoin that price never hit.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Lbank is a scam site no CS response
list_of_reviews.review: Lbank is a scam site. I wanted to withdraw/transfer some money and I got the error message“You have applied for a withdrawal which is still under approval and cannot be appied for temporarily”I contacted customer service to find out what this message means since the funds have been in there for months. And they said they would get right back to me with an answer. That was five days ago and ever since they have been ignoring my request for an updateIt appears that it’s a scam site so I’ll have to go after their registration and have it revoked

list_of_reviews.review_title: USER BEWARE..
list_of_reviews.review: USER BEWARE... Lbank is a scam exchange, you will lose funds, be warned. USE ALTERNATIVE EXCHANGE.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Scam
list_of_reviews.review: Scam, took my money and wont give it back. Do not use this company.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Fake Volumes! Fake Trade! Withdraw block!
list_of_reviews.review: Fake Volumes! Fake Trade! Withdraw suspending \ blocking b\c of liq. issues. Scam!Official groups are full of obvious bots. Positive reviews are also from bots.Stay away from this fraudulent cesspool!p.s. \ UPD: Their reply below is just regular official bla-bla about nothing. Dear LscamBank, pls wait for a nice video at YT and most distributed video services, which will demostrate all the desecribed above +\- communication with your so-called "support" too.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I made mistake by depositing BEP20…
list_of_reviews.review: I made mistake by depositing BEP20 token to ERC20 adress at my Lbank account. So I had problem. Customer support responded, warned me that it will take about 30 days to solve this problem. They took a fee. After 32 days problem was solved, my ETH was refunded(few grand $worth). So in my personal experience they are legit and ok. Then I bought btc instead of altcoin I previously wanted to buy, and succesfuly withdrawn it. So I will use this exchange in future.

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAAAM SCAAM be careful lbank steals…
list_of_reviews.review: SCAAAM SCAAM be careful lbank steals your money I have 188,000 usdt on lbank they ask me to check my account I check themI sent my photo several with my identity card I sent all the proof that asked me but each time he asks for other proof your bank statement strange requests

list_of_reviews.review_title: Lbank is reliable and can be trusted
list_of_reviews.review: Lbank is reliable and can be trusted.The customer support cannot be faulted.Everytime I have had an issue or problem, customer support has always stayed on the line with me until resolved.When investing DYOR, on every coin as some coins have tokenomics.When sending/receiving currency double check address and network and fees, ensure minimum amount is met.

list_of_reviews.review_title: LBank is a good exchange and I'm using it
list_of_reviews.review: I started using LBank mid 2021 and I can tell it's one of the best exchanges out there. They don't execute orders in hidden and no hidden charges .Another good thing about LBank is ther good customer support especially on telegram, they'll give you full support immediately you message their admins.I'll really recommend LBank fully to everyone out there

list_of_reviews.review_title: Sent some USDC from coinbase to LBANK…
list_of_reviews.review: Sent some USDC from coinbase to LBANK and using arbitruim network and they said it was the wrong USDC and wanted 0.04 eth to return the money back to my coinbase address and it would take 2 months i might have lost a bit of money with them but they ain getting any more

list_of_reviews.review_title: Lbank has been withholding our funds…
list_of_reviews.review: Lbank has been withholding our funds for 3weeks now. We have put a mandarin fluent speaking member to talk to them as to why our Usdt large amounts have been frozen, and withdrawal has been pending.They leave wechat and close the chat after no explanation, the support chat is no good with no explanation again.If our money isn't released soon we will be sending someone to hongkong to collect what's ours.

list_of_reviews.review_title: The seller of scam tokens
list_of_reviews.review: This exchange sells many scam tokens such as frzss and bobcoin.They basically accept any s@itcoin, they don't have any vetting mechanism. They are an accomplice in those scams.Update: "Risk in crypto markets" has nothing to do with selling scam tokens. LBank guys use this standard reply as a red herring.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Low performance platform for trading
list_of_reviews.review: Lbank platform is very hard to use compare to Binance, Crypto.com...and also when needed of tax report has to contact customer service that requires ridiculous things to take a selfie with the date and the photo ID. Much more with the person I chatted to named Kobe. The unprofessional and rude. Lbank needs alot of change band update to compete with other platform if they want to stand out. Otherwise they will keep losing customer due to inconvenience and rude people they hire.

list_of_reviews.review_title: From =India
list_of_reviews.review: From =India We are a Lbank customer and we are from India We did TRX withdrawal from Lbank on 28-11-22 after 2 minutes my account got closed then we contacted Lbank official he said.HCD Sir 👇1)Since you have triggered the risk control limit, you need to investigate your account, thank you.2) Your account triggers the risk control system, and the account is temporarily inoperable. Account not yet opened and withdrawal not received.it's been 8 days.  passed, no problem resolved. HCD sir is speaking please Wait. It is my mistake that we high withdrawn TRX more than that's why my account is not opening.🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻

list_of_reviews.review_title: Reading all these negative reviews is…
list_of_reviews.review: Reading all these negative reviews is definitely scary and i definitely feel for these people who feel they got scammed by Lbank, however i also have been using Lbank for the better part of a year and with no issues. Ive been VERY satisfied with all the Lbank features i have used and i just wanted to give them some postive credit amogst all the negative. At one point i have had upwards of 100,000 dollars of my money in Lbank and again, no isuues at all.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Deposited 160 matic into lbank and no coins…
list_of_reviews.review: Deposited 160 matic into lbank and no coins showed up in WALLET. did not initially put min amount in, lost those coins too even though they went into the wallet.  Total process a success, checked it on polygonscan, all good, submitted a ticket to lbank no reply , no coins deposited, checked online many other people in the same boat, want to take out my guzzler coins, have 302000 tokens , want to charge 1600000 coins to withdraw. total scam , no reply from support , no live chat to fix the problem, DONT USE LBANK ITS A SCAM,

list_of_reviews.review_title: Ghosting and not serious.
list_of_reviews.review: No experience of buying currency from them, but they asked for a photos and promotional video. We started with their requests, but in the middle of the process they stopped responding. Months later we still have the ideas on our table - for nothing. Ghosting and not serious at a high level. Not good.

list_of_reviews.review_title: So far all good
list_of_reviews.review: So far all good, I could deposit and withdraw easily. no kyc needed for small amount under 14btc. The exchange got some Gems on it (including the exchange own governance token LBK ). Loading & Staking.

list_of_reviews.review_title: All my gains now are frozen
list_of_reviews.review: All my gains now are frozeni think lbank will block everyone who make profit.i have always lose amd in one case i made profit but lbank decide to block me. Scameeeeeeeers!Hello, we have recently received feedback from users that trading pair has abnormal transactions due to account leakage due to poor management of the user's own account.After verification and comparison of system data, your account has participated in the abnormal transaction  trading pair.At present, the user has called the police, and the platform is actively cooperating with the competent authorities to deal with this matter, so your account assets are temporarily frozen.Sorry for the inconvenience caused to you, thank you.Best Regards,LBank

list_of_reviews.review_title: Ghosting and not serious.

list_of_reviews.review_title: So far all good

list_of_reviews.review_title: All my gains now are frozen

prompts_output.Output:

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.

Negative reviews focus on website functionality issues, bot activity, lack of personal engagement, repetitive promotional content, poor customer service, and problems with account verification and closure.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the www.lbank.info support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Customer support interactions in the reviews are generally positive, highlighting responsiveness and effectiveness, especially on Telegram. Users appreciate the support team's dedication to resolving issues promptly, although overall satisfaction with LBank is mixed.

overall_prompt_summary: The user feedback reveals a mixed satisfaction level, with both positive and negative aspects highlighted. Positive reviews commend the platform for its strong partnerships, advanced technology, educational benefits, trustworthiness, reasonable fees, user-friendly interface, and fast transactions. However, significant issues include website functionality problems, bot activity, lack of personal engagement, repetitive promotional content, poor customer service, and difficulties with account verification and closure. To improve user satisfaction, the platform should address these critical issues, particularly enhancing website functionality, reducing bot activity, and improving customer service. Further investigation into the root causes of these problems and implementing targeted solutions could significantly enhance the overall user experience.
